article_title: Conservative Radio Can Make Republicans Do Things They Don't Want To (VIDEO)
article_text: "And so if you are sitting over in the House of Representatives and some measures of defund Obamacare comes along and you think it’s a suicide mission because it might involve a government shutdown, you are going to be hesitant to oppose it anyway because you don’t want the most conservative — you don’t want the Tea Party and you don’t want the conservative radio talk show host on your back."
